articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Churning players out the door who are not making the grade is part of the job of running a football squad. Oh Hyeon-gyu didn’t get many opportunities at Celtic but failed to make enough of the ones he got. He could still go well after a reset in Belgium with Genk.  Getting our money back [...]

O’Riley has been targeted by Juve as they gear up to launch a [...]

Bernardo’s loan contract at Parkhead last season was reported to have an [...]

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC have won FORTY-ONE trophies in the 21st Century. It’s a phenomenal achievement in a stupendously successful 24 years for the club and the supporters. The sequence of extraordinary ascendancy is comprised of 18 titles, 12 Scottish Cups and 11 League Cups. The club made world history by achieving an eighth domestic clean sweep in season 2022/23. Six [...]

articles.description: EVAN WILLIAMS, who celebrates his 81st birthday today, was left in tears after the game of his life on May 6 1970. The goalkeeper, who had been brought to the club from Wolves in October the previous year, was probably the only Celtic player to emerge from the European Cup Final loss to Feyenoord at [...]
